title: Did Hotel 6 turn away a soldier because he was underage?
subtitle: Some hotel chains have implemented policies by which they refrain from providing rooms for persons under 21 years of age because of (what they consider to be) greater potential for younger guests to cause damage to facilities and other kinds of problems.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The Hotel Atlanta 6 sent away a soldier in the U.S. Army because he was a minor.
